name: Infiltration of the Sewage Control Headquarters
description: This is a 6-level wad for play in GZDoom. I spent a whole lot of time on this so please play it. I'm sure you will like it! Story: A new Icon of Sin has established itself in the Sewage Contol Headquarters (SCH). While spawning demons, it has also infected the cistern there in order to gain zombie soldiers. A squad was later sent, and you are one of them. Get into the Sewage Control Headquarters and defeat the new Icon of Sin!
